alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:14PM EDT until August 07 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sussex County in southern Delaware... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 914 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seaford, or 12 miles southwest of Georgetown, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Seaford, Millsboro, Laurel, Lewes, Selbyville, Bridgeville, Delmar, Dagsboro, Millville, Henlopen Acres, Gumboro, Sycamore, Long Neck, Ocean View, Blades, Frankford, South Bethany, Dewey Beach and Bethel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southern Delaware...and eastern Maryland. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southern Delaware...and eastern Maryland.
